articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang City and officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, together with senior party, state and army officials, entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed at the statues.
					
					 Also laid at the statues were floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with the participants paid high tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 He entered the hall of immortality where Kim Il Sung lies in state. 
					
					 He together with the participants made New Year greetings to Kim Il Sung in humblest reverence.
					
					 He went round the room where orders Kim Il Sung received are on display.
					
					 He entered the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He together with the participants made New Year greetings to Kim Jong Il in humblest reverence. 
					
					 He went round the room where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes New Year Address for 2017
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes New Year Address for 2017
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made a New Year address for 2017.
					 In his address he sent New Year greetings to all Koreans and the progressive people of the world.
					
					 2016 was a year of revolutionary and auspicious event and great turn to be specially recorded in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea and the country, he said, referring to the achievements made last year.
					
					 Last year the Seventh Congress of the WPK was held significantly with splendor as a grand political festival thanks to the high revolutionary enthusiasm of all the party members, service personnel and people and amid deep concern of the world.
					
					 The Seventh Congress proudly reviewed the glorious history of the struggle of the WPK, which had led the revolutionary cause of Juche to victory under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and unfolded a grand blueprint for accomplishing the socialist cause under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 An epoch-making turn was made in bolstering up the national defence capacity of Juche Korea and the DPRK soared as a nuclear and military power in the East that no formidable enemy dare encroach upon.
					
					 The proud victory was achieved in the 70-day and 200-day campaigns to glorify the Seventh Congress of the Party.
					
					 Thanks to the heroic struggle of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class and all other people, the gigantic goals of the 70-day and 200-day campaigns put forward by the WPK were successfully hit and a new breakthrough made in the country's economic development.
					
					 The new spirit of era for building a powerful socialist country was created and trust in the Party and faith in socialism were more deeply cherished in the hearts of the people during the 70-day and 200-day campaigns.
					
					 Kim Jong Un underscored the need to achieve the drastic advance in implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Party this year.
					
					 We should concentrate all efforts on the implementation of the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 This year's fighting goals should be hit without fail to open a bright prospect for the five-year strategy and put the overall economy of the country on a higher stage while consolidating the victory gained last year.
					
					 "Let us accelerate the victorious advance of socialism with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force!", this is a militant slogan we should uphold in the New Year's onward march.
					
					 It is necessary to actively wage the all-people charge for attaining the goal of five-year strategy by dint of the self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 In the field of science and technology it is imperative to solve scientific and technological problems arising in updating industrial establishments and putting the production on a normal footing there with a main emphasis on the local production of raw materials, fuel and equipment.
					
					 Electricity, metal and chemical industrial fields should take the lead.
					
					 In the coal industry and railway transport fields, a priority should be given to meeting the need for coal and its transport to power plants and metal and chemical factories.
					
					 It is important to quickly develop the machine industry.
					
					 A radical turn should be effected in light industry, agriculture and fisheries and thus a greater progress be made in improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 In the construction field, Ryomyong Street should be completed on the highest level and efforts be focused on the construction of important projects, and more educational and cultural facilities and dwelling houses be built wonderfully.
					
					 All sectors and units of the national economy should wage a vigorous drive to produce and economize as much as possible under the slogan of self-reliance and self-sufficiency and thus fulfill this year's plan on all indices.
					
					 The whole country should turn out for the land management.
					
					 On all fronts of culture including education, public health, sports and literature and arts, a fresh revolutionary surge should be brought to step up the building of a highly civilized nation.
					
					 The political and military position of socialism should be further cemented as an invincible fortress.
					
					 All the service personnel and people should share their thinking and breath with the Party and rally around it in thinking and purpose, morality and sense of obligation and work hard for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 We should resolutely smash the enemies' despicable and vicious moves to dampen the pure and ardent desire of the people for the Party and estrange the people from it.
					
					 It is also important to bring about a great surge in bolstering up the military capabilities.
					
					 Victory or defeat in this year's drive for implementing the decision made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party Korea depends on the role to be played by the party organizations and working people's organizations, Kim Jong Un said, stressing the need for all the primary party organizations to embody the basic spirit of the First Conference of Chairpersons of the Party Primary Committees and make sure that the spirit of uninterrupted innovation and advance is fully displayed in the all-out charge this year.
					
					 Kim Jong Un also called on the entire nation to pave a wide avenue to independent reunification by the united efforts.
					
					 It is necessary to take active measures to improve the north-south relations and defuse acute military conflict and danger of a war between the north and the south.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should solidarize and get united on the principle of subordinating everything to national reunification, the cause common to the nation, and activate the reunification movement on a nationwide scale.
					
					 It is needed to foil challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad going against the nation's desire for reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that unless the U.S. and its vassal forces stop nuclear threat and blackmail and unless they stop the war exercises which they stage right at our noses under the pretext of annual exercises, the DPRK would keep increasing the military capabilities for self-defence and preemptive striking capacity with a main emphasis on nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK will defend the peace and security of the country with its force and make active contribution to defending the world peace and stability, he stressed.
					
					 The WPK and the government of the DPRK will remain loyal to the ideas of foreign policy -- independence, peace and friendship --and make joint efforts to expand the good-neighborly friendship and cooperation with countries advocating independence and realize the genuine international justice.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that he would make devoted efforts to make sure that the days when our people sang the song "We Are the Happiest in the World" full of optimism about the future with deep trust in President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il only will become a reality today, not just a past days of history, and solemnly pledged to become a faithful servant serving the people with pure and sincere dedication.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Reviews Achievements Made Last Year
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Reviews Achievements Made Last Year
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in the New Year Address for 2017 reviewed the successes gained last year.
					 He said that 2016 was a year of revolutionary and auspicious event and great turn to be specially recorded in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea and the country.
					
					 Last year the Seventh Congress of the WPK was held significantly with splendor as a grand political festival thanks to the high revolutionary enthusiasm of all the party members, service personnel and people and amid deep concern of the world, he said, and continued:
					
					 The iron will of the Korean army and people to advance along the road of Juche forever under the leadership of the Party was fully demonstrated and an eternal foundation of the Korean revolution firmly laid through the historic Seventh Congress.
					
					 An epoch-making turn was made in bolstering up the national defence capacity of Juche Korea and the DPRK soared as a nuclear and military power in the East that no formidable enemy dare encroach upon.
					
					 The first H-bomb test and test-fire of various offensive means and nuclear warhead explosion test were successfully conducted, the work for studying and developing the latest armaments was brisk, and the preparations for launching the inter-continental ballistic missile reached the final stage. These epoch-making events, witnessed one after another in bolstering up the national defence capabilities, provided a powerful military guarantee for defending the destiny of the country and the nation and victoriously advancing the cause of building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 The Korean People's Army resolutely smashed the enemies' reckless aggression and war provocation moves and reliably defended the security of the country and the gains of the revolution and more perfectly rounded off political, ideological, military and technical preparedness as an invincible army.
					
					 The proud victory was achieved in the 70-day and 200-day campaigns to glorify the Seventh Congress of the Party.
					
					 Thanks to the heroic struggle of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class and all other people, the gigantic goals of the 70-day and 200-day campaigns put forward by the WPK were successfully hit and a new breakthrough made in the country's economic development.
					
					 Scientists and technicians successfully launched Kwangmyongsong-4, an earth observation satellite and succeeded in the ground jet test of a new type high-power engine of a carrier rocket for the geo-stationary satellite and thus opened a wide road to conquering space.
					
					 Model robotized production systems of Korean-style were established, high-yielding varieties produced in the field of agricultural production and other proud scientific and technical successes of important significance in the country's economic development and improving the people's living standard achieved one after another.
					
					 The production and transport goals were attained in important fields of the national economy, including electricity, coal, metal, chemical and building materials industries and the railway transport, and thus the potentiality of the independent economy was demonstrated, vigorously fuelling the building of a socialist economic power.
					
					 Many industrial establishments and cooperative farms made proud successes of surpassing the record of highest production, the People's Army took the lead to glorify the history of big fish hauls, the legendary construction speed was created at construction sites of important projects and admirable successes were made in the field of education, public health and sports.
					
					 The whole country turned out in hearty response to the call of the Party for the recovery of the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province, bringing about miraculous victory in a short period.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that the shining successes gained in all fields of the revolution and construction last year were not attributable to good conditions and accidental chances, adding the mysterious power that helped bring about all miracles and victory is the single-minded unity of all servicepersons and civilians and the great self-development spirit.
					
					 The single-minded unity is the lifeline of Juche Korea and driving force of great surge and the way to be taken by us is the self-reliance and self-development, he said, adding: This is the precious truth of the Juche revolution that the army and people of the DPRK proved in the gigantic struggle of 2016.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Advances Tasks for Effecting Drastic Turn in Implementing Decision of 7th Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Advances Tasks for Effecting Drastic Turn in Implementing Decision of 7th Congress of WPK
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for giving a boost to the revolutionary spirit that was fully displayed throughout the year 2016 of miracles, bring about a drastic turn in implementing the decision made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) this significant year and thus translate the people's ideal and dream into a brilliant reality on this land.
					 Kim Jong Un underscored the need to focus all efforts on implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 This year is an important year of great significance in implementing the five-year strategy, he said, noting that "Let us accelerate the victorious advance of socialism with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force!" is a militant slogan we should uphold in the new year's onward march.
					
					 He stressed the need to wage an all-people charge for attaining the goals of five-year strategy with the might of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 In the field of science and technology main efforts should be directed to solving scientific and technological problems arising in modernizing industrial establishments and putting production on a normal footing there with a main emphasis put on local production of raw materials, fuel and equipment.
					
					 Electricity, metal and chemical industrial fields should take the lead in this drive.
					
					 In the power industrial field, the qualitative maintenance of generating equipment and structures should be ensured and technical updating be stepped up to fulfill the plan for power production without fail.
					
					 The state integrated power control system should be operated in a substantial way and alternative production should be meticulously organized to ensure balance between electricity production and consumption. It is also necessary to develop a variety of power sources and massively create new generating capacities.
					
					 Advanced technologies should be introduced in the metal industrial field and cost of iron production be lowered and the operation of Juche-based production processes be normalized to produce more iron and steel.
					
					 In the chemical industrial field, the production should be invigorated at the February 8 Vinalon Complex, capacities of major chemical factories be expanded and technical processes be updated our own way to increase production of various chemical goods. Big efforts should be channeled into the work of establishing the C1 chemical industry and satisfactorily carry out phase-specific tasks.
					
					 In the coal industry and railway transport fields, the need for coal and its transport to power stations and metal and chemical factories should be ensured on a priority basis.
					
					 Modernization should be stepped up at the machine factories and serial production processes of new type tractors and rolling stocks and multi-purpose farming machines be rounded off and a variety of quality and high-performance machines and equipment be produced.
					
					 In the light industrial field, a drastic turn should be effected in diversifying and improving the quality of consumer goods by putting main emphasis on local production and provision of raw and other materials and by keeping production afloat based on proper management strategy.
					
					 In the agricultural front, a great surge should be brought about in scientific farming and active high-yielding movement be waged.
					
					 Good strains and scientific farming methods whose advantages have been proven in reality should widely be introduced and the areas under double-cropping be expanded and high-efficiency farming machines be actively invented and introduced in order to attain the goal of grain production without fail. A measure should be taken to ensure normal operation of the stockbreeding base in the Sepho area and the production of fruits, mushroom and vegetables be increased to bring benefits to the people.
					
					 In the fisheries field, active fishing should be waged and fish farming and sea culture should be pushed forward.
					
					 In the construction field, Ryomyong Street should be completed on the highest level and efforts be focused on major projects including the construction of the Tanchon Power Station, modernization project of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and construction of the Wonsan area, and more wonderful educational and cultural facilities and dwelling houses be built.
					
					 All the fields and all the units of the national economy should uphold the slogan of self-reliance and self-sufficiency and actively wage the drive for producing and economizing as much as possible, and fulfill plan for this year on all indices.
					
					 The whole country should turn out for land management. Modern tree nurseries should be built in provinces and persistent drive for forest restoration be pushed forward and river improvement and road repairing and environmental protection be carried out in a planned way in order to face-lift the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Un stressed the need to adopt innovative work style in economic guidance and business management with clear goals in order to bring about a turn in carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development. He stressed the need for the Cabinet and the economic guidance bodies to confidently put the overall national economy on a high level and thus shape strategy to keep the country's economy make sustained development and keep implementing it in a tenacious manner.
					
					 He also called on all the fronts of culture including education, public health, sports and literature and art to effect a new revolutionary surge and accelerate the building of a highly civilized nation.
					
					 He also underlined the need to consolidate the political and military position of socialism as an invincible fortress.
					
					 It is necessary to wage a high-pitched drive for increasing the military capabilities, he said, and went on:
					
					 Party ideological work should be waged in a positive way to make the party's ideology and breath only pervade the whole army. This year should be set again as the year of drills and as the year of rounding off the combat preparedness and the enthusiasm for perfecting high-intensive combat-readiness should be raised in all branches of arms and services and specialized units in order to bring up all the soldiers to be a a-match-for-a-hundred stalwart fighters possessed of the spirit of Mt. Paektu capable of foiling any aggression forces at a single blow.
					
					 The officers and men of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, and the members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards should firmly prepare themselves in political and military aspects and get themselves fully ready to reliably defend the socialist system and the life and property of the people.
					
					 Officials, scientists and working class in the national defence field should bear deep in mind the spirit of producing Yanji bomb displayed during the anti-Japanese struggle and the revolutionary spirit displayed by workers in Kunja-ri during the Fatherland Liberation War and develop and produce more powerful Juche weapons of our style so as to firmly build the arsenal of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Calls for Paving Wide Avenue to National Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Calls for Paving Wide Avenue to National Reunification
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2017 said that this year marks the 45th anniversary of the historic July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration, underscoring the need to pave a wide avenue to independent reunification by pooling efforts of the whole nation.
					 He said it is imperative to take active measures to improve the north-south ties and defuse acute military conflict and the danger of a war between the north and the south.
					
					 All kinds of slandering getting on the nerves of the other party and inciting confrontation can not be justified under any circumstances and sinister anti-DPRK smear campaign and hostile acts being staged with hope pinned on the overturn of social system and "change" must immediately be stopped.
					
					 Consistent is the stand of the DPRK not to fight with fellow countrymen but defend the wellbeing of the fellow countrymen and peace of the country. The south Korean authorities should not strain the situation by groundlessly faulting the DPRK's exercise of its right to self-defence but respond to our sincere efforts to prevent military conflicts and defuse tension between the north and the south.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should solidarize and get united on the principle of subordinating everything to national reunification, the cause common to the nation, and actively wage the reunification movement in a nationwide scale. Active contacts and visits should be made irrespective of differing ideology, system, region, idea, class and strata and a nationwide grand gathering for reunification should be realized with the involvement of the authorities, all political parties and organizations in the north and the south and people from all walks of life at home and abroad. We will hold hands with whoever prioritizes fundamental interests of the nation and wishes for the improvement of the north-south ties.
					
					 A nationwide struggle should be dynamically waged to put an end to the U.S. and other outsiders' moves for aggression and intervention aimed at realizing the Asia-Pacific domination strategy while consolidating their control over south Korea, and foil the moves of the group of sycophantic traitors standing against reunification including Park Geun Hye finding a way-out in escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen while not discerning who the truly principal enemy of the nation is. 
					
					 The U.S. should face up to the will of the Korean nation for reunification and no longer resort to such scheme of estranging Koreans from one another as egging the anti-reunification forces of south Korea on confrontation and war between the fellow countrymen but take a bold decision to withdraw its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The international community valuing independence and justice should stand against the U.S. and its vassal forces' moves of obstructing peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula, and its surrounding countries should do things helpful to the Korean nation's aspiration and efforts for reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Un underscored the need for all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to step up the nationwide grand advance for reunification by the joint efforts of the nation and thus do something to make this year a very significant year in paving a new phase of independent reunification.

articles.title: DPRK Will Defend Peace and Security of State and Contribute to Defending Global Peace and Stability: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
DPRK Will Defend Peace and Security of State and Contribute to Defending Global Peace and Stability: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his New Year address that the DPRK will certainly defend the state's peace and security by its own efforts and make a positive contribution to safeguarding the peace and security of the world.
					 The moves of the imperialist reactionary forces to put political and military pressure on the DPRK and sanctions on it reached an extreme point last year, but they could neither undermine our army's and people's faith in certain victory nor block the proud revolutionary advance of Juche Korea, he said. 
					
					 He said that as long as the U.S. and its followers persist in their nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK and, as long as they do not give up the war exercises staged under the cloak of annual drill right in front of the DPRK, the latter will continue to bolster the self-reliant defense capability and a capability for a preemptive strike with a nuclear force as its pivot.
					
					 He stressed that the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK will in the future, too, be faithful to the foreign policy tenet of independence, peace and friendship, and develop the relations of good-neighborliness, friendship and cooperation with countries advocating independence and make joint efforts to realize the genuine international justice.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under the KPA, after calling them to the building of the Party Central Committee.
					 The moment he appeared at the building, all the participants enthusiastically welcomed him, extending their most heartfelt thanks to him.
					
					 Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un extended his warm greetings to them.
					
					 Congratulating them, he had a picture taken with them.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials and fishermen in fisheries under the KPA would make bigger fish hauls in the new year, too.
					
					 Present at the photo session were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Sunday, the New Year's Day.
					 The message said that all the officials of Chongryon and other compatriots in Japan are looking back with deep emotion upon the last year in which the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea was held as the one of victory and glory under the outstanding and tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the position of Songun Korea was more consolidated and the greatest heyday of the Korean revolution was ushered in.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who has firmly defended the destiny of the country and the nation and opened a new road of national reunification and prosperity, is the greatest man who will hasten the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the socialist cause and the great leader who will bring about the bright future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea which will prosper year after year, the message said, adding:
					
					 You are the benefactor of the life of Chongryon and compatriots in Japan as you take care of them with the fatherly loving care and the illustrious leader who puts forward Chongryon as an example of overseas compatriots' movement of the world. 
					
					 All officials of Chongryon and other compatriots in Japan are full of determination to bring about a leap forward in the movement of Koreans in Japan along with the motherland which works hard to hasten the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche in significant New Year marking the 105th birth anniversary of the great leader President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of the great leader Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The message evinced the pledge to make a tangible contribution to the prosperity and development of the socialist country and the work for bringing earlier the country's reunification and thus fulfill their mission and patriotic duty before the country and the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message to Chairman of Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message to Chairman of Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a congratulatory message to Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Sunday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Seeing out significant year 2016 when the prestige of the country and the dignity of the nation were demonstrated to the whole world and seeing in the hopeful New Year 2017, I extend warm congratulations and greetings to the chairman and all other officials of Chongryon and compatriots in Japan.
					
					 Last year, Chongryon made long strides in its organizational up-building and patriotic work through positive struggle with the indomitable faith to share their destiny with the socialist homeland to the last despite the acute and complicated situation in which the hostile forces had got evermore pronounced in the moves to stifle the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 The shining miracles and proud successes made in the struggle for the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution are associated with the ardent patriotic efforts and devoted service rendered by officials of Chongryon and other compatriots in Japan who shared the thinking and intention with the people in the homeland though they lived in an alien land.
					
					 I extend, on behalf of all the people in the homeland, warm thanks to the officials of Chongryon and other compatriots in Japan who have firmly defended Chongryon, heritage left by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il out of patriotism, and actively advanced the patriotic work of Chongryon.
					
					 New Year 2017 is a significant year marking the 105th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il and a year of a turn in developing the movement of Koreans in Japan onto a higher stage as required by the new era of the Juche revolution.
					
					 In the new year, Chongryon should invariably give steady continuity to the history of warm feelings and kinship established by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with the Koreans in Japan and steadily preserve the nature of patriotic loyalty.
					
					 Expressing firm belief that the officials of Chongryon and other compatriots in Japan would demonstrate the might of Chongryon, rallied close around its Central Committee, along with the homeland advancing victoriously, Kim Jong Un wished the chairman and all other officials of Chongryon and compatriots in Japan good health and their families happiness in the New Year.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China Sunday on the New Year. 
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un turned the DPRK into a nuclear power equipped with H-bomb with his matchless courage and pluck and superb commanding art and thus smashed the persistent moves of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges to isolate and stifle the DPRK and their reckless moves to ignite a nuclear war and firmly protected the destiny of the country and the nation and peace and stability on the Korean peninsula, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 You kindled the flames of the 70-day campaign of loyalty and the 200-day campaign last year and turned the DPRK into a socialist fairy land where the song "We Are the Happiest in the World" sounds and the dreams and ideal of the people are being translated into bright reality.
					
					 Last year the motherland performed miracles and feats of dashing ahead like the wind towards a powerful socialist country, while demonstrating the dignity and might of the nation as a politico-ideological power with single-minded unity, invincible military power, youth power without an equal in the world, nuclear power in the East and space power. This is because that the motherland is holding in high esteem you, the respected Marshal, possessed of outstanding political ability, distinguished wisdom and noble love for the people.
					
					 You are the supreme leader of the revolutionary cause of Juche whom 80 million Koreans heartily upheld and the great sun of the nation to whom they entrusted their destiny and future.
					
					 The letter expressed the will to regard the idea of the Juche-oriented overseas compatriots' movement of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Un and their feats as lifeline and firmly defend and glorify them and further strengthen the General Association of Koreans in China into the invincible patriotic rank remaining loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Un only at all times.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from AINDF Central Committee
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) Sunday on the occasion of the New Year.
					 The message said that last year was a year of great victory in which the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation was fully demonstrated to the whole world and a more solid foundation laid for the prosperity of the nation and the final victory in the cause of national reunification under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Your election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK by the unanimous will and absolute trust of all the people in the north meant a great fortune for the compatriots and marked a great event in the human history as it promised a bright prospect for Juche Korea and the rosy future of national reunification, it said, adding:
					
					 Last year the national strength of Juche Korea which no formidable enemy dares attack was demonstrated at the highest level, deeply impressing the whole world.
					
					 You hastened the final victory in the building of a powerful socialist country of Juche and the cause of national reunification with your distinguished idea and leadership, shouldering upon yourself the destiny of the era and the nation. Your long journey of patriotic devotion will brilliantly shine, recorded in the year of 2016.
					
					 The message evinced the resolution to cement the ranks of AINDF into ranks of loyalty that follow as one in mind Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages in any storm and stress, and staunchly fight for the victory of the revolutionary movement and the cause of national independence under the great banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Greetings to Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Palestinian President
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the start of the Palestinian revolution. 
					 The message sincerely wished the Palestinian people greater success in their just struggle and the president in his responsible work to retake the legitimate national rights including the right to found an independent state with Kuds as its capital city.
					
					 It expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would invariably and steadily grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Egyptian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Egyptian President
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greetings from Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of of Egypt, on December 29 last year.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am very pleased to extend heartfelt congratulations to Your Excellency on the occasion of the New Year 2017.
					
					 I wish you good health and happiness and the friendly people of the DPRK greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I also wish your country and all other countries stability and prosperity in the new year.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Emir of Kuwait
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Emir of Kuwait
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greetings from Sabah Al-Ahmad Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, emir of the State of Kuwait, on December 13 last year.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am pleased to extend my heartfelt congratulations and wishes to Your Excellency on the occasion of the New Year 2017.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I wish, sharing joy with you, that the new year will bring peace, stability, well-being and prosperity to all peoples of the world.
					
					 I hope that Your Excellency will be in good health and the excellent relations between the two countries and peoples will further develop.

articles.title: Foreigners and Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners and Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Foreigners, including diplomatic envoys and military attaches of embassies of different countries and representatives of the missions of international organizations here, and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Sunday on the occasion of the New Year Juche 106 (2017).
					 The visitors paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls of immortality where they lie in state, they made deep bows to the great leaders.
					
					 They went round the rooms where orders the great leaders received are on display and rooms that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by the great leaders for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 On the same day, the chief and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il on New Year
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il on New Year
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- The people in the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their smiling portraits across the country to pay tribute to them on the occasion of the New Year.
					 In the capital city of Pyongyang, many citizens climbed the Mansu Hill where the statues of the great leaders are standing.
					
					 Seen there was a floral basket from Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed at the statues were floral baskets, together with bouquets and flowers, in the names of party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, industrial establishments and schools at all levels in the city.
					
					 Also laid was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The visitors paid high tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of KPA units, institutions and enterprises were placed before the statues of the great leaders and their smiling portraits at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang.
					
					 Meanwhile, servicepersons, working people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues of the great leaders and their smiling portraits in their residential areas.

articles.title: Participants in 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Fourth Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under the Korean People's Army visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Sunday. 
					 They entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 At the halls of immortality where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they made deep bows to them.
					
					 Then they looked round the rooms where orders the great leaders received are on display and rooms that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: New Year's Day Significantly Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
New Year's Day Significantly Celebrated in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK significantly enjoyed the New Year, full of confidence in victory and delight.
					 They visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people of various circles and school youth and children paid high tribute to the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill of Pyongyang and other different parts of the country.
					
					 Celebration performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Schoolchildren gave New Year's performances in every province. And they enjoyed the New Year's Day, playing folk games.
					
					 Public catering establishments in the country were packed with visitors.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- A new stamp was issued in the DPRK on the occasion of the New Year Juche 106 (2017). 
					 Seen on the stamp are letters "Juche 106 (2017)" and "Happy New Year" against the full scene of the Sci-Tech Complex covered with snow.
					
					 The Sci-Tech Complex, the great temple of learning for all the people located on Ssuk Islet in the Taedong River flowing through Pyongyang, is shaped like a gigantic atom.

articles.title: Public Catering Establishments Crowded with People
articles.content:
Public Catering Establishments Crowded with People
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Public catering establishments in different parts of the DPRK are busy with their holiday services on the New Year's Day.
					 Nearly 30 noodle restaurants in Pyongyang, including Okryu Restaurant and Mangyongdae Chonsok Restaurant, serve visitors up noodle with pheasant meat and noodle in flat vessel with meat. 
					
					 Delicacy House under Okryu Restaurant serves sturgeon and Sinsollo (dish in cooking brazier).
					
					 Roe steak is on sale at Chongryu, Kyonghung and other restaurants, being appreciated by visitors.
					
					 Kyongam, Sinhung and other restaurants in local areas also serve their special dishes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and news agencies of different countries carried special write-ups and articles in commemoration of the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The International Daily of Indonesia on December 15 last year dedicated a whole page to an article titled "Whole life dedicated to people" together with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and the photo of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The paper under sub-titles of "Viewpoint on people," "Political idea of believing in people as in Heaven," "Personality as popular leader" and "People-bound train" praised Kim Jong Il for making ceaseless field guidance for happiness of the people day and night with warm love for them.
					
					 The December issue of the German newspaper Rote Fahne in an article titled "Songun and independent politics" illustrated with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il said he protected Korean socialism from all moves of the imperialists, holding aloft the banner of Songun at the end of the last century.
					
					 The December issue of the Belarusian newspaper Bperyod carried a photo-illustrated article captioned "December 17 in DPRK is the day for remembering the great Comrade Kim Jong Il." 
					
					 The Kuwait Times on Dec. 15 carried an article titled "Life shining with patriotic devotion."
					
					 The News Agency of DR Congo on Dec. 11 introduced Kim Jong Il's noble viewpoint on the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings, seminars, round-table talks, book, photo, stamp and handicraft exhibitions and film shows took place at different units of Russia between December 11 and 19 last year in commemoration of the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos showing the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books, photos, stamps and handicrafts.
					
					 Korean films introducing Kim Il Sung University and Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp were shown.
					
					 Present at the events were Russian figures of different social standings and officials of the DPRK mission in Russia.
					
					 The first secretary of the Amur Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the chairman of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity", the chairman of the Maritime Territorial Branch of the Youth Guards which is the All-Russia public organization under the United Russia Party, and the director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism praised Kim Jong Il as a peerless patriot, great son of the people who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people and outstanding statesman revered by the whole world.
					
					 A daughter of Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier, said the relations between President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and her father and family were the unbreakable blood ties.
					
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial Preparatory Committee of Russia for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu said that Kim Jong Il will always be remembered by the peoples of the two countries as he made a great contribution to the development of the traditional Russia-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 The secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation extended invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their drive to dynamically push forward the building of a powerful socialist country under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Korean book, picture and craftwork exhibitions, remembrance meetings and film shows were held in Peru, Mexico, India, Thailand, Singapore, Ukraine, Austria, Bulgaria, Germany, Algeria, Angola, South Africa and Nigeria between December 9 and 25 last year.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the events were photos dealing with the revolutionary career of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Their works and books on their greatness, and books, pictures and craftworks introducing the DPRK's development were also displayed.
					
					 Korean films "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World", "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" were shown.
					
					 The president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union said that under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the DPRK demonstrated its might as Kim Il Sung's Korea all over the world while decisively smashing the U.S. persistent nuclear threats.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico said Kim Jong Il firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country from the U.S. imperialists' moves for aggression by pursuing his unique Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the secretary general of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK noted that Kim Jong Il steadily advanced the Korean socialism under the unfurled banner of Songun in the unprecedented difficult period.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Ukraine.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Different Countries
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Lectures, Round-table talks and reading sessions took place in Mexico, Serbia, Bulgaria, Nigeria, Guinea, Angola and Ghana between Dec. 3 and 15 last year on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism lauded Kim Jong Il for meeting all challenges and aggressive moves of the imperialists and defending socialism with his outstanding Songun politics.
					
					 Personages of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Lagos State of Nigeria and its housing construction company and the Guyco Company of Guinea said the ideology and exploits of Kim Jong Il are so great that no one can deny. The exploits he performed by developing the Workers' Party of Korea into a genuine mother party serving the people will last forever, they added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia mensaje del Ano Nuevo 2017
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia mensaje del Ano Nuevo 2017
Pyongyang, primero de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un pronuncio el mensaje del Ano Nuevo 2017. 
					Antes que todo, el envio el saludo del Ano Nuevo a todo el pueblo coreano y los demas progresistas y amigos del mundo.
					
					El 2016 fue un ano de jubilo revolucionario y de gran viraje que se registrara en letras mayusculas en la historia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la patria, dijo el Mariscal y enumero los exitos alcanzados en el ano pasado:
					
					En el ano expirado, se ha celebrado significativa y solemnemente el VII Congreso del PTC como gran festival politico, gracias al elevado entusiasmo revolucionario de todos los militantes del Partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y los habitantes y bajo la gran atencion de todo el mundo. 
					
					El VII Congreso del PTC hizo balance orgulloso de la gloriosa historia de lucha del PTC, que bajo la sabia orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, ha conducido a la senda siempre victoriosa la causa revolucionaria del Juche, y presento el magno proyecto para llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista bajo la bandera del kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo. 
					
					Se ha logrado un cambio trascendental en el mejoramiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional de la Corea del Juche y nuestra patria emergio como potencia nuclear y militar del Oriente que disuade a cualquier enemigo por muy poderoso que fuera. 
					
					Se han logrado exitos orgullosos en las campanas de 70 y 200 dias para glorificar el VII Congreso del Partido. 
					
					Como resultado de la lucha heroica de la clase obrera kimilsungista-kimjongilista y todos los habitantes, se alcanzaron enormes metas de las campanas de 70 y 200 dias y se abrio la nueva ruta de avance en el desarrollo economico del pais. 
					
					Durante esas campanas, se creo el nuevo espiritu de la epoca para la construccion de potencia socialista y se hizo mas firme la confianza del pueblo en el Partido y el socialismo. 
					
					Kim Jong Un instruyo lograr este ano significativo un avance trascendental en la materializacion de la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC:
					
					Hay que concentrarse en el cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de economia nacional.
					
					Es preciso alcanzar sin falta las metas de lucha de este ano para abrir buenas perspectivas para el cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal y llevar a la etapa elevada la economia nacional en su conjunto consolidando la victoria lograda en el ano pasado. 
					
					"!Impulsemos el avance victorioso del socialismo por la gran fuerza motriz que es la capacidad de fortalecernos con nuestros propios medios!", esto es la consigna combativa a ser levantada este ano en la marcha del Ano Nuevo.
					
					Se debe librar con dinamismo la ofensiva de todo el pueblo para conquistar las metas de la estrategia quinquenal con el poderio de autofortalecimiento.
					
					En la rama de ciencias y tecnicas, se debe esforzarse principalmente por resolver los problemas cientifico-tecnicos, que se presentan en la modernizacion de las fabricas y empresas y en la normalizacion de la produccion, dando enfoque a asegurar con recursos nacionales las materias primas, combustibles y equipos necesarios. 
					
					Deben ser abanderadas las industrias electrica, metalurgica y quimica. 
					
					Les corresponde a los dominios de industria carbonifera y transporte ferroviario cubrir con preferencia las demandas de carbon y transporte de las plantas de generacion electrica y las fabricas metalurgicas y quimicas. 
					
					Es necesario desarrollar cuanto antes la industria de maquinaria. 
					
					Se debe desarrollar trascendentalmente la industria ligera, la agricultura y la pesqueria para el mayor avance en el mejoramiento de la vida poblacional. 
					
					En el sector de construccion, hay que terminar en el maximo nivel la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong, concentrar las fuerzas en las obras importantes y levantar mucho mas establecimientos docentes y culturales y viviendas. 
					
					En todos los dominios y unidades de la economia nacional, deben dinamizar la campana para aumentar al maximo la produccion y ahorrar lo todo bajo la consigna de autoconfianza y autoabastecimiento y cumplir en todos los indices el plan de este ano. 
					
					Todo el pais debe incorporarse a la administracion del territorio nacional.
					
					Hay que adelantar la construccion de potencia civilizada al registrar nuevo auge revolucionario en todos los planos de la cultura, incluso la educacion, salud publica, deporte, literatura y arte. 
					
					Resulta imprescindible consolidar firmemente la base politico-militar del socialismo como baluarte inquebrantable.
					
					Todos los militares y habitantes deben luchar tenazmente por la prosperidad de la patria, unidos firmemente en lo ideologico y en lo moral en torno al Partido manteniendo relaciones consanguineas con esta organizacion.
					
					Han de frustrar rotundamente las sucias y brutales maniobras de los enemigos encaminadas a socavar la fidelidad inmaculada del pueblo al Partido y separar a ambos.
					
					Es imperioso librar una fuerte campana para consolidar las fuerzas armadas.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente dijo que la victoria o el fracaso de la campana de este ano por materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC depende del papel de las organizaciones del Partido y las de entidades de masas.
					
					Especifico que todas las organizaciones primarias del Partido deben hacer reinar el temperamento de la innovacion continua y el avance continuo en la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo de este ano materializando el espiritu principal de la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido.
					
					Hay que abrir la amplia via de reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion.
					
					Deben tomar medidas activas para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y eliminar el agudo choque militar y el peligro de guerra entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar tiene que solidarizarse y unirse en el principio de sujetar lo todo a la reunificacion de la patria, causa comun de la nacion, y activar el movimiento por la reunificacion en escala pannacional.
					
					Ademas deben frustrar los desafios de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion internas y externas que nadan a contrapelo de la aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. y sus satelites mantengan la amenaza y chantaje nucleares y no cesen los ejercicios de guerra que se libran en nuestra cara bajo el pretexto de "anuales", la RPDC seguira incrementando la capacidad de autodefensa con las fuerzas armadas nucleares como eje y la de ataque preventivo.
					
					La RPDC defendera con las fuerzas propias la paz y seguridad del Estado y contribuira mucho a defender la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
					
					En el futuro tambien, El PTC y el gobierno de la Republica seran fieles al ideal de su politica exterior de independencia, paz y amistad, ampliaran y desarrollaran las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion con los paises defensores de la independencia y se esforzaran junto con ellos por establecer la verdadera justicia internacional.
					
					Kim Jong Un subrayo que trabajara con abnegacion para que no se quede como un momento de la historia, sino se convierta en realidad de hoy aquella epoca en que todo el pueblo entonaba la cancion "No envidiamos nada a nadie en el mundo" confiando en el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y viviendo con el optimismo de su futuro.
					
					En la primera manana del Ano Nuevo prometio solemnemente que sera el servidor verdadero que trabaje para el pueblo con la fidelidad y el alma casta.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il con motivo de Ano Nuevo 2017
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il con motivo de Ano Nuevo 2017
Pyongyang, primero de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito con Ri Sol Ju el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan para rendir homenaje a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il con motivo del Ano Nuevo 2017.
					En la ceremonia de homenaje participaron tambien Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los miembros del organo de direccion central del Partido en esta capital y los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente entro junto con los cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los grandes Lideres. 
					
					Ahi fue depositado un cesto de flores a nombre de Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Tambien, fueron colocados el cesto de flores en nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC, y el otro a nombre comun del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					Kim Jong Un rindio tributo a los grandes Lideres junto con sus acompanantes. 
					
					Luego, dirigio junto con ellos el saludo del Ano Nuevo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos y paso revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes que recibieron por los lideres antecesores.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en IV reunion de activistas de rama pesquera del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en IV reunion de activistas de rama pesquera del EPC
Pyongyang, primero de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se retrato con los participantes en la IV reunion de activistas de la rama pesquera del EPC delante del edificio del Comite Central del Partido. 
					Cuando el salio al lugar de filmacion, los participantes le acogieron con hospitalidad expresandole el mas cordial agradecimiento. 
					
					Luego de felicitar cordialmente a ellos, el Maximo Dirigente se fotografio con ellos expresando la esperanza y seguridad de que en el Ano Nuevo tambien, los funcionarios y pescadores del EPC aumentaran las capturas de pescados. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del Comite Central del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita al presidente del Presidium del CC de la Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita al presidente del Presidium del CC de la Chongryon
Pyongyang, primero de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion a Ho Jong Man, presidente del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon). 
					Al acoger el 2017, ano nuevo lleno de esperanzas, tras pasar el 2016 en que se manifestaron a todo el mundo el impetu de la patria y la dignidad de la nacion, el Maximo Dirigente envio las calurosas felicitaciones y cordial saludo al remitente y otros funcionarios de la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon. 
					
					En el ano pasado la Chongryon alcanzo un gran avance en la construccion de organizacion y en las labores patrioticas librando una lucha tenaz con la indoblegable conviccion de compartir hasta el final el destino con la patria socialista, aun en la situacion delicada y compleja en que se tornaron mas siniestras que nunca las maniobras anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon de las fuerzas hostiles, senala la misiva. 
					
					Prosigue que en los milagros asombrosos y exitos orgullosos, logrados en el ano pasado en la lucha por la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, estan impregnados los esfuerzos patrioticos y abnegados de los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon quienes compartieron el proposito y el alma con los habitantes en la patria. 
					
					Reflejando el alma de todos los habitantes en la patria, envia el calido agradecimiento a los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon quienes defendieron con firmeza la Chongryon, herencia patriotica del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y desarrollaron vigorosamente las labores patrioticas de la Chongryon. 
					
					Senala que el Ano Nuevo 2017 es el ano significativo y de gran cambio en que se celebraran el 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el 75o del nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y se debe desarrollar a una etapa mas elevada el movimiento de coreanos residentes en Japon de acuerdo con la demanda de la nueva era de la revolucion del Juche. 
					
					En el Ano Nuevo la Chongryon debe continuar invariablemente la historia de linaje consanguinea establecida por los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il con los compatriotas residentes en Japon y glorificar ininterrumpidamente el temperamento de fidelidad patriotica, indica. 
					
					Expresa la seguridad de que los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon, unidos compactamente en torno al Comite Central de la Chongryon, exaltaran mas el poderio de su organizacion junto con la patria en prosperidad, y desea buena salud al destinatario y otros funcionarios de la Chongryon y coreanos en Japon y felicidad a todas sus familias.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidium del CC de la Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidium del CC de la Chongryon
Pyongyang, primero de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia primero el Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) con motivo del Ano Nuevo 2017.
					El mensaje senala que todos los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon recuerdan con emocion el ano pasado en que gracias a la destacada y probada orientacion del Mariscal, el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea concluyo como conclave de victorias y glorias, se consolido mas la posicion de la Corea del Songun y se abrio la era de esplendor de la revolucion coreana. 
					
					Alaba al Mariscal, quien defendio con firmeza el destino del pais y la nacion y abrio la nueva ruta de reunificacion y prosperidad de la patria, como el mejor de los grandes hombres y gran dirigente que adelanta la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la del socialismo y asegura el futuro maravilloso de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il que prosperara de generacion en generacion.
					
					Continua que el Mariscal atiende con amor paternal a la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon y presenta esta organizacion como modelo del movimiento mundial de compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					Subraya que todos los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon estan bien decididos a levantar un auge en el movimiento de coreanos residentes en Japon junto con la patria que adelanta la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche en el Ano Nuevo significativo en que coinciden el 105o aniversario del natalicio del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y el 75o del nacimiento del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Expone la voluntad de cumplir con la mision patriotica asumida ante la patria y la nacion al hacer aporte peculiar a lograr la prosperidad de la patria socialista y adelantar la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de felicitacion de Asociacion General de Coreanos en China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de felicitacion de Asociacion General de Coreanos en China
Pyongyang, primero de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta de felicitacion que le dedicara el dia primero la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China, con motivo del Ano Nuevo 2017.
					La misiva senala que con la incomparable audacia, temperamento y arte de mando militar el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un convirtio la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la potencia nuclear con bomba H frustrando las obstinadas maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento anti-RPDC y los imprudentes alborotos de guerra nuclear de los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus lacayos y defendio con firmeza el destino de la patria y nacion y la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Continua que en el ano pasado el Mariscal propuso la campana de 70 dias y la de 200 dias de fidelidad y convirtio la RPDC en el paraiso socialista donde se repercute la cancion "No envidiamos nada a nadie en el mundo" y se realizan los suenos e ideales del pueblo. 
					
					Enfatiza que gracias a tener al Mariscal con extraordinaria capacidad politica, la clarividencia y el noble amor al pueblo, en el ano pasado la patria creo los milagros y meritos ostentando la dignidad y el poderio de la nacion como la invicta potencia ideo-politica y militar y la unica potencia de la juventud y la potencia nuclear y espacial del Oriente y marchando a galopes hacia la cima de la potencia socialista.  
					
					Alaba a Kim Jong Un como Maximo Dirigente de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, respetado por 80 millones de coreanos, y gran Sol en que toda la nacion coreana deposita su destino y futuro. 
					
					Manifiesta la decision de defender y glorificar en el Ano Nuevo la idea de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu y del Mariscal sobre el autoctono movimiento de compatriotas residentes en ultramar y sus proezas y fortalecer la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China como invicto destacamento patriotico que apoya con fidelidad la direccion del Mariscal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del CC del FDNA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del CC del FDNA
Pyongyang, primero de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia primero el Comite Central del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista con motivo del Ano Nuevo 2017.
					El mensaje senala que el ano pasado fue el de grandes victorias en que bajo la sabia orientacion del Mariscal, se manifestaron plenamente a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la potencia Paektusan y se consolido mas el fundamento para la prosperidad de la nacion y la victoria final de la causa de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Afirma que la eleccion del Mariscal como Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, por la unanime voluntad y absoluta confianza de todos los habitantes de la RPDC, fue la gran fortuna y jubilo de toda la humanidad que aseguro el futuro maravilloso de la Corea del Juche y el movimiento de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Destaca que en el ano pasado, se ha elevado al nivel cimero el poderio de la Corea del Juche a que ningun enemigo poderoso se atreve a atacar, hecho que admiro a todo el mundo. 
					
					Apunta que brillaran en las paginas de 2016 los esfuerzos abnegados por el pueblo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien asumiendo el destino de la epoca y la nacion, adelanto la victoria final de la construccion de potencia socialista del Juche y la causa de reunificacion de la patria con su destacada idea y orientacion. 
					
					Expresa la decision de fortalecer el FDNA como destacamento de fidelidad, que enaltezca siempre a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y apoye con fidelidad al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, y luchar con dinamismo por transformar el territorio surcoreano y lograr la victoria de la causa de independencia nacional bajo la bandera del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 52o aniversario de inicio de revolucion palestina
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 52o aniversario de inicio de revolucion palestina
Pyongyang, primero de enero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente del Estado de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, con motivo del 52o aniversario del inicio de la revolucion en este pais.
					En su misiva, el remitente desea de todo corazon mayores exitos en la justa lucha del pueblo palestino para rescatar los legitimos derechos nacionales incluso el de fundar un Estado independiente con Kuds como capital y los trabajos responsables del destinatario.
					
					Expresa la esperanza y conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose invariablemente.
